text: Kimhi or Kimchi () is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Alona Kimhi (born 1963), Israeli author and actress *David Kimhi (1160–1235) *Joseph Kimhi (1105–1170) *Moses Kimhi (c. 1127 – c. 1190) *Shavit Kimchi (born 2002), Israeli tennis player *Solomon Kimhi, Turkish rabbi ==See also== *Kimchi (disambiguation) Category:Jewish surnames Category:Hebrew-language surnames
title: Kimhi
